EmailTemplate.name: WBN-2018-10-03 7 Days to Azure.ES-2018-10-03 7 Days to Azure Webinar Invite 1 -
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar: 7 Days to Azure
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/turbonomic-6-2/]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Windows and SQL 2008 (R2) will go end of service within the next 18 months. While this may sound far off, the time to prepare is now.
As a top Microsoft Partner for assessments, migration, and optimizations, Turbonomic delivers the industry’s fastest, most precise, dynamic, cloud-ready migration plans to ensure a frictionless migration to Azure.
<[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/turbonomic-6-2/]]>
Join our webinar on October 3rd at 11 a.m. ET <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/turbonomic-6-2/]]> where we'll discuss how a Big 4 Accounting Firm leverages Turbonomic to assess and migrate workloads to Azure and subsequently optimize their entire hybrid estate in Azure. Regards, Elizabeth
PS - If you can't join the live webinar, feel free to sign up anyways <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/turbonomic-6-2/]]>, and we'll send you the recording afterward.
